headline: U.S. appeals court finds Trump tariffs unlawful, setting up likely Supreme Court showdown
A federal judge signaled that she will move quickly to rule on whether President Trump acted unlawfully in moving to fire Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook
New video appears to show New Zealand fugitive dad with his child
Top Zelensky adviser invites Trump special envoy Steve Witkoff to Ukraine after latest Russia attack
California Gov. Newsom says crime is higher in Republican-led cities as San Francisco residents sue over drug policies destroying their city
Rosie O’Donnell falsely rants that transgender Minneapolis Catholic school shooter was ‘MAGA person, white supremacist’ in conspiracy-laden TikTok
A group of House lawmakers from across the political spectrum has agreed on a proposal that would ban members of Congress from trading individual stocks
Trump revokes former Vice President Kamala Harris’s Secret Service protection
The Trump administration said it is using an untested strategy to rescind $4.9 billion in foreign aid without congressional approval, sparking a Capitol Hill backlash
UK, France and Germany move to reimpose UN sanctions on Iran
